wikipedia_page.main: Charles Moore (23 December 1771 – 14 December 1826) was an English politician. He served in the House of Commons of Great Britain from 1799 to 1802 as Member of Parliament for Woodstock. He was later the member for Heytesbury in the enlarged House of Commons of the United Kingdom from 1802 to 1806 and again from 1807 to 1812.
